#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long int ll;

int main()
{
	int n,i,test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--){
	ll capacity;
	
	cin>>n>>capacity;
	ll space[n+1];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	 cin>>space[i];
	
	ll mask= pow(2,n)-1;
	int j;
	ll diff=capacity;
	
	for(i=0;i<=mask;i++)
	{
		ll sum=0;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			if(i&(1<<j))
			{
				sum+=space[j];
				//cout<<space[j]<<" ";
			}
			
		}
	//	cout<<endl;
		
		if(capacity>=sum && (capacity-sum)<diff)
		diff=capacity-sum;
	}
	
	cout<<diff<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
